about_the_game:
Start your career in logistics today in Forklift Simulator!
Take on a variety of different missions, a selection of vehicles and an extensive career mode in which you can put your skills to the test.
Are you ready for the challenges ahead?


Start your career in the logistics sector by passing your theoretical and practical forklift driving licence test. After that you start working in a small company and progress to larger companies in the course of your career, where you can complete extensive tasks and unlock new vehicles.
After completing the career-mode you can continue your shift in free play mode to complete orders and missions as you wish.

Missions

Complete a variety of different and authentic missions that occur every day in a logistics company. From assembling pallets and inspecting load conditions to sorting out broken loads and, of course, transporting freights, there are many different jobs waiting for you to take care of!


Unlock a range of vehicles in the course of the career mode, including three different forklift trucks and an electric pallet truck. So you are well equipped for every job!

Features

  • 3 different reproduced forklift trucks + 1 electric pallet truck
  • 3 different companies with a career/story mode
  • Different freights
  • Inspection of freight condition
  • Assembling pallets
  • Endless delivery mode with procedurally generated forklift truck missions
  • Driving licence test/driving school and tutorial
  • Realistic control of the forklift trucks
  • Realistic graphics
  • Choice of male and female character with first- and third-person view

Start your career in logistics today in Forklift Simulator!

Are you ready for the challenges ahead?


Start your career in the logistics sector by passing your theoretical and practical forklift driving licence test. After that you start working in a small company and progress to larger companies in the course of your career, where you can complete extensive tasks and unlock new vehicles.
After completing the career-mode you can continue your shift in free play mode to complete orders and missions as you wish.

Missions

Complete a variety of different and authentic missions that occur every day in a logistics company. From assembling pallets and inspecting load conditions to sorting out broken loads and, of course, transporting freights, there are many different jobs waiting for you to take care of!


Unlock a range of vehicles in the course of the career mode, including three different forklift trucks and an electric pallet truck. So you are well equipped for every job!

name: Forklift Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 Intel Chip 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 TI
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 TI or better
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Start your career in logistics today in Forklift Simulator! Take on a variety of different missions, a selection of vehicles and an extensive career mode in which you can put your skills to the test. Are you ready for the challenges ahead?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
